p frauds, liars or whatever?? about their experiences with Spirit communica=
tion, you should expect to be attacked!! THAT is a very simple concept!

--=

lp with the tests: the experts being the people here. That I way I can lear=
n.=C2=A0 I have contributed a testing process so far, run several public te=

ly believe everything people tell me.=C2=A0 
=C2=A0
I don't understand why =
you would think that should be reason to be kicked out of the group.
